# Prosedur Kontak & Eskalasi - TokoPedia Customer Service

## Level 1: Self-Service

### Help Center Online
- **URL**: help.tokopedia.com
- **Tersedia**: 24/7
- **Gunakan untuk**: FAQ, tutorial, kebijakan umum

### Chatbot TOKI
- **Akses**: Icon chat di app/website
- **Respon**: Instant
- **Capabilities**:
  - Cek status pesanan
  - Info resi
  - FAQ automation
  - Redirect ke agent jika perlu

[Docs]

### Call Center
- **Nomor**: 1500-600
- **Jam**: 24/7
- **Panduan IVR**:
  - Tekan 1: Masalah ...
